data.fullContent: After returning from an exhausting trip, Taylor and her boyfriend realized they had been living in the same apartment for three years and wanted a new home. She had always wanted to live near a lake, so she was excited to find a lakeside home for sale in her price range. She told her boyfriend, and they went over to look at the house. They loved it, and the price was good, so they quickly decided to buy the house. They paid extra money to have it fixed up just the way they wanted it, and the renovations were done just in time for them to move in.

q1.translation: 在一次筋疲力尽的旅行回来后，泰勒和她的男友意识到他们已经在同一个公寓住了三年，想要一个新家。她一直想住在湖边，所以她很高兴能在自己的价格范围内找到一套湖边住宅出售。
q1.front: After returning from an exhausting trip, Taylor and her boyfriend realized they had been living in the same apartment for three years and wanted a new home. She had always wanted to live near a lake, so she was excited to find a lakeside home for sale in her price range.

q2.translation: 在一次筋疲力尽的旅行回来后，泰勒和她的男友意识到他们已经在同一个公寓住了三年，想要一个新家。她一直想住在湖边，所以她很高兴能在自己的价格范围内找到一套湖边住宅出售。她告诉了她的男朋友，然后他们去看了房子。他们很喜欢这房子，而且价格也不错，所以他们很快决定买下它。他们付了额外的钱，把房子按他们想要的方式修理好，翻修工作完成后，他们正好可以搬进去。
q2.front: After returning from an exhausting trip, Taylor and her boyfriend realized they had been living in the same apartment for three years and wanted a new home. She had always wanted to live near a lake, so she was excited to find a lakeside home for sale in her price range.
q2.middle: She told her boyfriend, and they went over to look at the house.
q2.ending: They loved it, and the price was good, so they quickly decided to buy the house. They paid extra money to have it fixed up just the way they wanted it, and the renovations were done just in time for them to move in.

options.sentence: Taylor and her mother quickly moved into the new house they were renting.
They each moved in with each other and rented out their apartments.
After much thought, she decided on the condo with the floor plan she liked.
She told her boyfriend, and they went over to look at the house.

q3.selectAnswer: Taylor and her boyfriend realized they had been living in the same apartment for three years

options.sentence: Taylor talked to the real estate agent about what interested her, and the agent went right to work searching the available listings.
Taylor put money into a savings account for two years before she could afford the down payment on her condo.
Taylor didn't need her condo anymore, so she decided to sell it and move to a smaller place.
Taylor and her boyfriend wanted to move from their apartment, so they bought a house on a lake.
